title: A Pair of Chases - Both PSA 5 - Moved to Net54 Auction
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: A Pair of Chases - Both PSA 5 - Moved to Net54 Auction
posts.post_content: The White Cap is a Piedmont 150.  Black Cap is Piedmont 350.  Both super clean and bright, especially the tougher White Cap.  Neither will disappoint.
